title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Speaking from the heart to a loved one or family member helps to cultivate unity where once there was division. Its likely that a dense issue has been weighing heavily on your mind or theirs. Perhaps you didnt know how to address this sticky topic before or there simply wasnt enough time for a serious conversation. Thankfully, your stars are aligned now, emboldening you to open up to each other while the compassionate Pisces Moon trines Mercury in piercing Scorpio. After you are free of your burdens pressures, you can spend more pleasurable time together. There is no stronger mortar between individuals than honesty. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
